name: Billionaire
description:
Characteristic of Billionaire :

1. Create a marine Pavilion, which marine animals are belong to you;

2. Control the breeding rate of animals according to the birth rate and mortality rate.

3. How to use the shortest time to reach one trillion gold coins, test your wit and strategy.


Introduction to play:

At the beginning of the game, what we have to do is to get loan.

After buying animals, more than 2 of the same animal will reproduce.

• Placement of kind of play, easy to achieve billionaires;

• Easy to understand, suitable for recreation;

• Build your marine Pavilion, try your best to reach your goals as soon as possible.


I only make 15 kinds of marine animals, Sorry for that.
